channel.title: "Unknown Error" after you report a player
channel.description:
#### What happened? After I reported a player after the game with in-game menu (hint "Report Player" popped up) instead of "Report Player" "Unknown Error" popped up.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Another message or no message should be popped up instead of "Unknown Error".
#### Steps to reproduce: Read above.
#### Comments: It's an old bug, idk why it wasn't reported/fixed yet. On my screen the message was "Unknown Er", not "Unknown Error", but I guess "ror" just doesn't fit my screen.

item.title: "Unknown Error" after you report a player
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
What happened?

After I reported a player after the game with in-game menu (hint “Report Player” popped up) instead of “Report Player” “Unknown Error” popped up.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Another message or no message should be popped up instead of “Unknown Error”.

Steps to reproduce:

Read above.

Comments:

It’s an old bug, idk why it wasn’t reported/fixed yet. On my screen the message was “Unknown Er”, not “Unknown Error”, but I guess “ror” just doesn’t fit my screen.

Read full topic
item.source: "Unknown Error" after you report a player
